Learn What it takes to be a Web Developer in 2020

Other technologies

Mobile Developer

  • Web technologies to build mobile apps
    • Flutter- SDK from Google to build native mobile apps. Uses Dart
    • React Native- Build native mobile apps using the React framework
    • NativeScript - BUild native mobile apps with JS, TS, Angular or Vue
    • Ionic - Build hybrid mobile apps with JavaScript
    • Xamarin - Build native mobile apps with C#
    • Courses on Youtube
      • Node.js Crash Course
      • Python Crash Course
      • PHP Front to back
      • C# Project in 60 seconds
      • Go Crash Course
      • Rust Crash Course

PWA: progressive Web Apps - (Regular web apps(HTML/CSS/JS) but have a native feel for the device)

  • look great on all screens
  • Offline content with service workers
  • Installable
  • Splash Screen
  • Must be HTTPS
  • reliable, fast and engaging
  • Courses on Youtube
    • Intro to service workers
    • PWA with Vue.js

Desktop Apps with Electron - Cross platform desktop applications with JavaScript

  • Uses Node.js and Chromium
  • High Data Security
  • High Performance
  • Accessibility
  • Examples: VSCode, Atom, Postman, Discord
  • Courses on Youtube
    • Intro to Electron
    • Build an Electron app

JAMstack - "client-side JS, reusable APIs & prebuilt Markup"

  • No restriction on framework or library
  • Websites are served as static html files generated from source files, such as
    markdown using a static generator like Gatsby
  • High Performance, generated at deploy time
  • Cheaper and easy to scale
  • Easy to host(Netlify)

Serverless architecture - no need for your own server

  • "Backend" or "Functions" as a service (Faas)
  • Reduce complexity and costs
  • Less infrastructure to manage
  • AWS Lambda and Netlify
  • Courses on Youtube
    • Lambda functions with Netlify

API first design With more IoT expect to see api-focused design

  • Traditionaly - UI -> backend -> connection to web app
  • With API first design - APIs and then products on top of it
  • Courses on Youtube
    • What is a REST API

ML/AI and the Web

  • Alternative to conventional data mining
  • Remove security threats
  • Machine Learing APIs
  • Producing content
  • Study user behaviour
  • Courses on Youtube
    • Machine Learning In JS with Brain.js

Speech Recognition

  • HTML5 Web Speech API
  • Google Speech to text
  • Dialog Flow
  • Courses on Youtube
    • Text to speech and synthesis app

Web assembly - early stages(Low-Level bytecode can run in the browser)

  • Generated by languages like C,C++ and Rust
  • Much faster than JS
  • Not a replacement for JS, works alongside it
  • Next level video games, tools in the browser
